Magic circles generator

What is it ?

Originally, a simple css challenge around recursive and semantic rules which became something more complicated than I originally intended. I have a fascination for hermeticism, alchemy and magic, so I thought I might put those in the mix and make a magic circle generator. There is many room for improvements, but I'm quite happy with the results despite some glitches due to the way inner texts are handled.

All the figures are plain css. Javascript is used to generate the markup, which should be self-explanatory. Scroll or refresh the page to generate new circles ad nauseam.
